soa:Action.name: Populate
soa:Action.action: <Populate xmlns:soa="urn:telestream.net:soa:core" xmlns="urn:telestream.net:soa:metadata" soa:identifier="90c431c2-2988-452c-a742-b0dc9970ac11" soa:workflowmode="closed" soa:opencapable="true" soa:behavior="Modify" soa:disposition="Success" soa:factorygenerated="false" soa:lightspeed="false" soa:required_architecture="vantageserver" soa:valid="true" soa:retrymode="default" soa:resourcecostmode="default" soa:customresourcecost="1"><soa:CustomRetrySet limitrecurring="false" recurringiterations="10"><soa:FirstRetry enabled="true" time="10" unit="seconds" priority="10" /><soa:SecondRetry enabled="false" time="5" unit="minutes" priority="10" /><soa:ThirdRetry enabled="false" time="1" unit="hours" priority="10" /><soa:Recurring enabled="false" time="15" unit="minutes" priority="0" /></soa:CustomRetrySet><soa:Generate identifier="05cca279-a32d-4c95-a85e-899ed85b16cf" enabled="false" type="datetime" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action start time" name="Start time" /><soa:Generate identifier="3375706f-c3ee-4e98-a27b-e290dd1ff654" enabled="false" type="datetime" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action end time" name="End time" /><soa:Generate identifier="fa9d0aac-98ab-4dd9-ac7b-a4bdd8b14d62" enabled="false" type="int32" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action elapsed time in seconds" name="Elapsed time (seconds)" /><soa:Generate identifier="d8bbd125-ad1f-40fa-aa81-446a6288b482" enabled="false" type="double" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action throughput value. For transcode actions, this value will indicate the realtime speed factor. For example, a value of 0.5 indicates that the transcode was performed at 2x realtime speed, a value of 2.0 indicates that the transcode was performed at 1/2 realtime speed." name="Throughput value" /><soa:Generate identifier="5f6b3e7f-bc05-4672-845b-6f9bf229c3a0" enabled="false" type="string" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action throughput description" name="Throughput description" /><soa:Generate identifier="7e759ffa-9cfe-4802-8285-01cbb36d3977" enabled="false" type="string" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action's final state (usually "Complete" or "Failed")" name="Final state" /><soa:ActionVersion version="6.3.0.50" /><Producer soa:identifier="6a1ce0de-a939-46f7-a1ed-fcc621e9851a" soa:name="Variables From Label Parameters" soa:description="Add variables to the job, from parameters within a label" soa:leftaligncheckboxes="false" soa:instance="fcaee4d5-7b94-445e-b8a2-ff716218f0b7" For transcode actions, this value will indicate the realtime speed factor. For example, a value of 0.5 indicates that the transcode was performed at 2x realtime speed, a value of 2.0 indicates that the transcode was performed at 1/2 realtime speed." name="Throughput value" /><soa:Generate identifier="5f6b3e7f-bc05-4672-845b-6f9bf229c3a0" enabled="false" type="string" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action throughput description" name="Throughput description" /><soa:Generate identifier="7e759ffa-9cfe-4802-8285-01cbb36d3977" enabled="false" type="string" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action's final state (usually "Complete" or "Failed")" name="Final state" /><soa:ActionVersion version="6.3.0.50" /><Locator xmlns:p3="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" p3:type="Associator" soa:identifier="dbb838fd-33e1-470e-b8f0-6381b3d7ef1a" soa:name="Attachment Files" soa:description="Watch a hot folder for attachment files" soa:leftaligncheckboxes="false" soa:instance="66f3480c-0e6f-43bc-8508-a84eae663c38" soa:signature="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" soa:menuname=""><soa:Parameter type="int32" identifier="1479484c-d257-4d15-9c64-40cf61dcc1f0" name="Cycle" description="The number of seconds between checking for files in the hot folder" enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">5<soa:Minimum>5</soa:Minimum><soa:Maximum>120</soa:Maximum><soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="int32" identifier="91fb30f6-f8f8-4a09-b30f-0665b7653510" name="Count" description="The number of times a file must remain unaltered before a new job is started" enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">2<soa:Minimum>1</soa:Minimum><soa:Maximum>5</soa:Maximum><soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="boolean" identifier="16a40510-8800-45a0-9515-6e2e2ff50763" name="_Look in Subfolders" description="Descend into subfolders as well as the specified folder when looking for new material." enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">False<soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="boolean" identifier="be871322-8bee-4d2c-ade3-83fc43bcb717" name="Process E_xisting Files:" description="When enabled, activating the workflow will process files already in the folder" enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">False<soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="boolean" identifier="80a5aeeb-d43b-44c1-bd28-8d1077cbb933" name="Since last workflow deactivation" description="Only process files newer than the time the workflow was last deactivated" enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">False<soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="boolean" identifier="2bf9f664-768b-4c1d-ad44-99156971f5a7" name="Limit to last:" description="Only process files for the specified time range." enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">False<soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="int32" identifier="1a6a9068-0a06-41b8-89b5-6c28f1197057" name="Process Existing Period" description="The time range that Process Existing Files is limited to" enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">7<soa:Minimum>1</soa:Minimum><soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="string" identifier="0e306a9b-b78a-4f33-8b24-a0d78b739afc" name="Process Existing Time Unit" description="The time range that Process Existing Files is limited to" exclusive="true" enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">days<soa:Option>minutes</soa:Option><soa:Option>hours</soa:Option><soa:Option>days</soa:Option><soa:Option>weeks</soa:Option><soa:Option>months</soa:Option><soa:Option>years</soa:Option><soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="boolean" identifier="c91063ab-4833-4be6-9f30-4f42b211fce2" name="_Send Offline Notification Emails" description="Send an email to the administrator when the action goes offline." enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">False<soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="boolean" identifier="9628165a-2a64-4b87-b33d-d6c9cd3fd330" name="Stop looking after:" description="If no matching file is found after the specified duration, the action will complete with the specified state." enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">False<soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="int32" identifier="044e9d58-ac05-4cb3-9415-c136b63748e8" name="Seconds to wait" description="The number of seconds to wait for the file to be found." unit="seconds" enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">60<soa:Minimum>1</soa:Minimum><soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="complex" identifier="b1d296fc-a704-445e-9bff-d2864eeb195c" name="TimeoutState:" description="The workflow state which should be emitted if the file is not found." enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1"><soa:Complex identifier="8bea76fe-ff75-4e4e-80aa-a7673a0bb010" name="Success"><soa:Property type="int32" identifier="dc0de581-80c5-4d0d-b8df-2da8356637c0">2</soa:Property></soa:Complex><soa:Option><soa:Complex identifier="8bea76fe-ff75-4e4e-80aa-a7673a0bb010" name="Success"><soa:Property type="int32" identifier="dc0de581-80c5-4d0d-b8df-2da8356637c0">2</soa:Property></soa:Complex></soa:Option><soa:Option><soa:Complex identifier="632629d9-15ac-42fa-aa59-40016578378a" name="Failure"><soa:Property type="int32" identifier="ec4a53ff-20c9-4a4d-95d0-dc7352941d4d">3</soa:Property></soa:Complex></soa:Option><soa:Option><soa:Complex identifier="6405be3c-b6ea-4444-bc91-2f289cd6e433" name="Ignore"><soa:Property type="int32" identifier="a6a8eec8-47a0-4de5-81c4-4df48eba415a">1</soa:Property></soa:Complex></soa:Option><soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="boolean" identifier="1e3cf69d-939e-4bfb-92c7-0e4f32e04caf" name="Active on_ly " description="Specify a time range during which the watch should be active (otherwise it is always active)" enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">False<soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="datetime" identifier="c2a65498-4d93-49ad-9406-4d8a8cebd0bf" name="from" editor="time" enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">0001-01-01T18:00:00<soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="datetime" identifier="4739a213-9731-4f2d-a4b1-91eab4ad7d67" name="to" editor="time" enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">0001-01-01T23:00:00<soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Parameter type="int32" identifier="cfbf1e10-59c6-4031-bd71-10d33afbdcee" name="Days of week" description="Specify the days on which the watch should be active" enabled="true" enabledinvariants="true" disableable="false" browsable="true" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">127<soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired></soa:Parameter><soa:Feature identifier="dbb838fd-33e1-470e-b8f0-6381b3d7ef1a" name="Attachment Files" restriction="inoperable" /><soa:FileSystem identifier="8ec65285-11ac-45a5-9652-425b7494b0df" name="Windows" description="Windows File System" leftaligncheckboxes="false" instance="397c13eb-c113-4c36-9c11-da1ebd6fdab5" signature="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" menuname="" scheme="file" opencapable="true" consumeopen="true" emitopen="true"><soa:Location>file://V:/</soa:Location><soa:Files /></soa:FileSystem><Filters p3:type="Join"><soa:Pattern>*.xml<soa:Behavior>accept</soa:Behavior></soa:Pattern></Filters><soa:Generate identifier="901c31f7-dd19-4c82-b637-e747d329d4d3" enabled="false" type="string" description="When enabled, the selected variable will be set to the name of the detected file. For example, if the file: 'C:\media\myfile.mpg' is detected; this variable will contain 'myfile.mpg'." name="File Name"><soa:Condition identifier="1308d16b-0657-4d8d-ac6c-f9e66381c8b7" name="File Name" description="The name of a file (without path)." leftaligncheckboxes="false" instance="868226db-6333-4bdb-b6b8-ef9785754e15" signature="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" menuname="" type="string" internal="false" fulfillmententryrule="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" editor="filebrowser"><soa:Value><soa:Default /></soa:Value></soa:Condition></soa:Generate><soa:Generate identifier="08e554d4-5c6b-4525-bc44-b14f16d20a58" enabled="false" type="uri" description="When enabled, the selected variable will be set to the path and name of the file." name="File Path"><soa:Condition identifier="134c61d5-f011-4f57-9f5e-d3c0d50d2a45" name="File Path" description="" leftaligncheckboxes="false" instance="fa4430bf-90fb-4205-95ab-0fabf30eabc3" signature="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" menuname="" type="uri" internal="false" fulfillmententryrule="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" editor="filebrowser"><soa:Value><soa:Default /></soa:Value></soa:Condition></soa:Generate><soa:Generate identifier="89967e15-007d-40f2-a2bd-92387bc5b7e2" enabled="false" type="datetime" description="When enabled, the selected variable will be set to the modification timestamp of the newly detected file." name="File Modified Date" /><soa:Attachment identifier="1165c2e4-4d2d-4bac-8fc0-5d3842af8b14" name="XML file" description="" leftaligncheckboxes="false" instance="25c2f174-a296-44c8-ad90-d494d87762e6" signature="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" menuname="" itemmode="closed" position="External" outputencoding="Utf8" encodingfallback="Fail" /></Locator></Watch>

For example, a value of 0.5 indicates that the transcode was performed at 2x realtime speed, a value of 2.0 indicates that the transcode was performed at 1/2 realtime speed." name="Throughput value" /><soa:Generate identifier="5f6b3e7f-bc05-4672-845b-6f9bf229c3a0" enabled="false" type="string" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action throughput description" name="Throughput description" /><soa:Generate identifier="7e759ffa-9cfe-4802-8285-01cbb36d3977" enabled="false" type="string" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action's final state (usually "Complete" or "Failed")" name="Final state" /><soa:ActionVersion version="6.3.0.50" /><soa:Item xmlns:p3="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" p3:type="soa:Store" identifier="1165c2e4-4d2d-4bac-8fc0-5d3842af8b14" name="XML file" description="" leftaligncheckboxes="false" instance="25c2f174-a296-44c8-ad90-d494d87762e6" signature="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" itemmode="closed" position="External" outputencoding="Utf8" encodingfallback="Fail" /></Delete>

soa:Action.name: Archive

<Package xmlns:soa="urn:telestream.net:soa:core" xmlns="urn:telestream.net:soa:staging" soa:identifier="dc333bc3-77e1-4b6e-944f-ed3c572d37e3" soa:workflowmode="closed" soa:opencapable="false" soa:behavior="Modify" soa:disposition="Success" soa:factorygenerated="false" soa:lightspeed="false" soa:required_architecture="vantageserver" soa:valid="true" soa:retrymode="default" soa:resourcecostmode="default" soa:customresourcecost="1" soa:outputlocationtype="DefaultStore" soa:collisionresolution="uniquify"><soa:CustomRetrySet limitrecurring="false" recurringiterations="10"><soa:FirstRetry enabled="true" time="10" unit="seconds" priority="10" /><soa:SecondRetry enabled="false" time="5" unit="minutes" priority="10" /><soa:ThirdRetry enabled="false" time="1" unit="hours" priority="10" /><soa:Recurring enabled="false" time="15" unit="minutes" priority="0" /></soa:CustomRetrySet><soa:Generate identifier="05cca279-a32d-4c95-a85e-899ed85b16cf" enabled="false" type="datetime" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action start time" name="Start time" /><soa:Generate identifier="3375706f-c3ee-4e98-a27b-e290dd1ff654" enabled="false" type="datetime" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action end time" name="End time" /><soa:Generate identifier="fa9d0aac-98ab-4dd9-ac7b-a4bdd8b14d62" enabled="false" type="int32" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action elapsed time in seconds" name="Elapsed time (seconds)" /><soa:Generate identifier="d8bbd125-ad1f-40fa-aa81-446a6288b482" enabled="false" type="double" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action throughput value. version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xml:lang="en" lang="en" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <head>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=utf-8" />
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Style-Type" content="text/css" />
    <title>ZIP Archive</title>
    <!-- DO NOT PLACE COMMENT LINES (LIKE THIS) ANYWHERE ABOVE THE HTML ELEMENT - IT CAUSES THE PAGE TO NOT RENDER OR DISPLAY IN VANTAGE -->
    <!-- Target: Vantage_ManPgs -->
    <!-- This Page.asp file is in TW\Stationery_Project\Targets\Vantage_ManPgs\Pages\Page.asp -->
    <!-- this page template is defined with NO external resources (CSS, images) per requirements of embedded Vantage man pages -->
    <!-- This embedded CSS is as small as possible - only those para and char tags actually used in man pages are defined. -->
    <!-- If you start using another Frame tag, be sure to add it to the css -->
    <!-- Update record -->
    <!-- 10-25-12 Added fontsize and margin to NCaution. Added .Emphasis and .Keyboard LJW -->
    <!-- 6-10-13 - accidentally introduced a copyright symbol back into the foot which causes all kinds of havoc - pulled LJW -->
    <!-- 8-1-13 - Replace div tag in the white filename p tag at bottom with  ref to pFileName css entry to solve HTML syntax error in IE9 - LJW -->
    <!-- 12-11-13 - Mod heading1-4 formats to improve the design, add H0Heading - LJW -->
    <style type="text/css">
@charset "utf-8";
html,body{text-align:left;min-height:100%;margin-left:5px;font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:13px;line-height:120%;background-color:#fff}
.pFileName{color:white}
.Body,.SNStepNumber{text-align:left;min-height:100%;margin:5px 5px 8px 64px;font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:13px;line-height:120%;background-color:#fff}
p{margin:5px 5px 8px 64px;width:90%}
ul li{list-style:inside;list-style-type:disc}
.H0Heading{margin-bottom:24px;margin-top:48px;margin-right:10px;text-align:right;font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:34px}
.H1Heading{margin-bottom:12px;margin-top:20px;font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:20px}
.H2Heading{margin-bottom:8px;margin-top:16px;font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:18px;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold}
.H3Heading{margin-bottom:6px;margin-top:14px;font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold}
.H4Heading{font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:14px;font-weight:bold;margin:5px 5px 8px 64px}
em{font-style:italic;font-family:"Times New Roman",Times,serif;font-size:1.2em}
.ATAnchorTable,.Note{margin-left:64px;margin-top:-4px}
.NNote{font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:13px;margin:5px 5px 8px 64px;}
.NCaution{font-weight:bold;font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:13px;margin:5px 5px 8px 64px;}
.Bold,.N_007cAlert{font-weight:bold;float:left}
.Emphasis{font-style:italic}
.Keyboard{font-family:Courier, "Courier New"}
.N_007cBulletSymbol{margin-left:-32px}
.titleBlock{text-align:right;font-size: 16px;font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-weight:bold}
.titleBlockText{line-height: 90%;text-align:right;font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size: 10px}
.L1BLBulletedList_outer{font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:13px;}
.L1BLBulletedList_inner span {font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:13px;margin-left:-12px}
div .L1BLBulletedList_inner {font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:13px;margin-left:-24px}
.L2BLBulletedList_outer{font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:13px;}
.L2BLBulletedList_inner span {font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:13px;margin-left:8px}
div .L2BLBulletedList_inner {font-family:Arial,Verdana,Geneva,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:13px;margin-left:-4px}
</style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <blockquote>
      <div class="H1Heading"><a name="1100744">ZIP Archive</a></div>
      <div class="Body"><a name="1101657">The ZIP archiver is implemented in the Archive action.</a></div>
      <div class="NNote">
        <span class="N_007cAlert">Note:&nbsp;</span><a name="1101330">Files archived into a standard ZIP file must each be less than 4 GB (4,294,967,295 bytes). The ZIP archive itself also must be less than 4GB. If either of these limits is exceeded, the archive is created using Zip64 format. Zip64 format supports file sizes up to approximately 9 million terabytes (2^63-1 bytes), but they may not be compatible with some ZIP utilities.</a></div>
      <div class="Body"><a name="1094137">&nbsp;</a></div>
    </blockquote>
    <p class="titleBlock">Telestream, Inc.</p>
    <p class="titleBlockText">
      <a href="http://www.telestream.net">www.telestream.net</a>
    </p>
    <p class="titleBlockText">Copyright <span>2014 Telestream, Inc. All rights reserved worldwide.</span></p>
    <p class="titleBlockText">
      <span>April, 2014</span> | <span>128097</span></p>
    <p class="pFileName">
      <span>Telestream.Soa.Facility.Staging.Resource.Packager.Zip.html</span>
    </p>
  </body>
</html></soa:Content></soa:Manual><soa:Generate identifier="b1f2ec73-b36f-451f-992c-7bb7f7ed868c" enabled="false" type="string" description="The name of the zip file." name="File Name" map="FileName" /><soa:Generate identifier="e08823a4-cd2c-478e-89eb-1cdcbbdf0a60" enabled="false" type="int64" description="The size in bytes of the zip file." name="File Size" map="FileSize" /><soa:Generate identifier="60aaccdb-8434-4260-90ec-5e01e317941e" enabled="true" type="uri" description="The full path of the zip file." name="File Path" map="FilePath"><soa:Condition identifier="e38e4ea3-e900-49cf-84a3-02eda09ea980" name="Project Path - Zip Archive" description="" leftaligncheckboxes="false" instance="f274efe3-e89e-4e15-b5a1-037aa470190e" signature="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" menuname="" type="uri" internal="false" fulfillmententryrule="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" editor="filebrowser"><soa:Value><soa:Default /></soa:Value></soa:Condition></soa:Generate><soa:Generate identifier="6fee648c-7dd3-44e9-ad7f-d4c3a48d5bda" enabled="false" type="string" description="The MD5 hash signature for a given file." name="Hash Key" map="Key" /></Packager></Package>

For example, a value of 0.5 indicates that the transcode was performed at 2x realtime speed, a value of 2.0 indicates that the transcode was performed at 1/2 realtime speed." name="Throughput value" /><soa:Generate identifier="5f6b3e7f-bc05-4672-845b-6f9bf229c3a0" enabled="false" type="string" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action throughput description" name="Throughput description" /><soa:Generate identifier="7e759ffa-9cfe-4802-8285-01cbb36d3977" enabled="false" type="string" description="When enabled, the specified variable will be set to the action's final state (usually "Complete" or "Failed")" name="Final state" /><soa:ActionVersion version="6.3.0.50" /><Converter soa:identifier="fab5f730-8910-403e-a42a-6e06e579c7a9" soa:name="Attachment To Label" soa:description="Transform an attachment to a label using XSLT" soa:leftaligncheckboxes="false" soa:instance="c300b32a-6987-4e7f-930b-1cc04eac0bc8" soa:signature="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" soa:menuname=""><soa:Feature identifier="fab5f730-8910-403e-a42a-6e06e579c7a9" name="Attachment To Label" restriction="inoperable" /><soa:Transformation identifier="de1e6bc2-3830-4ed6-896f-85b4175fd997" name="Vantage_XSLT_Transform" description="" leftaligncheckboxes="false" instance="ce798b90-cab6-44ba-bf9b-d5316b66c91b" signature="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" menuname="" Xsl="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<xsl:stylesheet 
	xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"
	xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
	xmlns:soa="urn:telestream.net:soa:core"
	version="1.0">
	<xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes" />
	
	<xsl:template match="/">
		<soa:Label xmlns:soa="urn:telestream.net:soa:core" identifier="3b42ca65-67d6-44df-acb3-29760653942a" name="Vantage_XSLT_Transform" description="" instance="751ff02f-c905-4d3b-9c1d-875fda7b2487" signature="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000">

			<soa:Parameter type="string" identifier="be7ab6cf-cb46-4783-91d9-c3c9936fd2c0" bindable="True" name="ProjectPath" enabled="true" disableable="false" optionseditable="false" row="-1" column="-1" columnspan="1">
				<xsl:value-of select="/project/ProjectPath[1]"/>
				<soa:IsRequired>false</soa:IsRequired>
			</soa:Parameter>
		</soa:Label>
	</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>
